Mint chutney: 

1 bunch mint leaves 

6 green chilies 

4 garlic cloves 

1 tsp white cumin 

Salt as required

1. Take a bunch mint leaves, 4 chopped garlic and 1 tsp cumin and grind it. Add in salt. Cook it. 

2. Grind together chicken mince and bread slices chop them. 

3. Chopped kashmiri mirch, chopped green chilies, a bunch green coriander, salt. Coriander, all spice powder and an egg. Mix it. Make kabab and fry them. Grease the baking tray and bake the kabab. Brush butter on them and serve.
